name: Shockwaves (Tomoopera)
description:
Controls:

WASD to move and left click to shoot

Made this all by myself, so it might not be the best game. It should work at least. Put so much time on little effects and enemies that people might miss.

I couldn't think of a story here, but I tried to put something.

It was so late for me to test this version but i hope it works.
